snippet: The police said the man, Mitsuyoshi Kamiya, who was arrested on Okinawa, confessed to making bomb threats in three phone calls this month.
abstract: Mitsuyoshi Kamiya is arrested in Japan for making bomb threats against United States Embassy in Tokyo and American military base in Okinawa.
lead_paragraph: The police said the man, Mitsuyoshi Kamiya, who was arrested on Okinawa, confessed to making bomb threats in three phone calls this month.

headline.main: Japanese Police Arrest Man Accused of Threatening to Bomb U.S. Embassy and Base
headline.print_headline: Asia; Japan: Police Arrest Suspect in Threats Against U.S.
